name: ProcJumper
description:
A platformer  where the character is procedurally generated! Each time you load in you'll be given a different jump style, along with random effects that trigger when you jump or occur ambiently.

Use A and D or Left and Right to move, and Space to jump. Press R to reset and a get a new random platformer character.

Really, Proc-Jumper is more of a toy than a game -- there isn't really an objective. Just try experimenting and see what kind of weird characters get generated!
